scenes.name: Opening
scenes.summary: The Peddler introduces Agrabah and hints at the story of Aladdin and the magic lamp.
scenes.firstLine: Oh I come from a land, from a faraway place where the caravan camels roam.
scenes.lastLine: Perhaps you would like to hear the tale?

sentiment.quote: Perhaps you would like to hear the tale?

scenes.name: Jafar Tries to Get the Lamp
scenes.summary: Jafar, with Iago and Gazeem, tries and fails to retrieve the magic lamp from the Cave of Wonders.
scenes.firstLine: You...are late.
scenes.lastLine: Seek thee out the diamond in the rough.

sentiment.quote: Trust me my pungent friend. You'll get what's coming to you.
Oh there's a big surprise!
Who disturbs my slumber?

scenes.name: Aladdin's Escape
scenes.summary: Aladdin evades capture after stealing bread, highlighting his cleverness and agility.
scenes.firstLine: Stop thief! I'll have your hands for a trophy street rat!
scenes.lastLine: All I gotta do is jump!

sentiment.quote: All this for a loaf of bread?
Hello!

scenes.name: Jasmine Disguised in the Marketplace
scenes.summary: Princess Jasmine disguises herself and explores Agrabah's marketplace, experiencing life outside the palace for the first time.
scenes.firstLine: Pretty lady buy a pot. No finer pot in brass or silver.
scenes.lastLine: No no please!

sentiment.quote: I don't think so.
Wow!

scenes.name: Aladdin Saves Jasmine
scenes.summary: Aladdin saves Jasmine from being punished for theft, revealing his kindness and quick thinking.
scenes.firstLine: Thank you kind sir. I'm so glad you've found her.
scenes.lastLine: Then jump!

sentiment.quote: Just play along.
What are you doing?

scenes.name: Jafar's Plot
scenes.summary: Jafar devises a plan to become Sultan by marrying Princess Jasmine, showcasing his ambition and deceit.
scenes.firstLine: Jafar, this is an outrage.
scenes.lastLine: Kersplat!

sentiment.quote: Marry the shrew? I become sultan.
Jafar? What if you were the chump husband?
Jasmine, Jafar now let's put this whole messy business behind us.
When I am queen, I will have the power to get rid of you.

scenes.name: Aladdin Discovers the Genie
scenes.summary: Aladdin rubs the lamp, releasing Genie, who explains the rules of wish-making.
scenes.firstLine: Ah almost. There are a few provisos, a couple of quid pro quos.
scenes.lastLine: You ain't never had a friend like me!

sentiment.quote: You're gonna grant me any three wishes I want?
No substitutions, exchanges or refunds.
Oh oh. Aladdin? Wake up. Aladdin.

scenes.name: Aladdin's First Wish
scenes.summary: Aladdin cleverly uses his first wish to escape the Cave of Wonders without explicitly making a wish.
scenes.firstLine: Excuse me? Are you lookin' at me? Did you rub my lamp?
scenes.lastLine: Weeee'rrrrrreee...outta here!

sentiment.quote: Some all-powerful genie--can't even bring people back from the dead.
You're gettin' your wishes so siddown!

scenes.name: Aladdin's Decision
scenes.summary: Aladdin contemplates his next wishes and decides to use them to win Princess Jasmine's heart, showing his longing and ambition.
scenes.firstLine: Now that I'm out of the cave, I can show Jasmine I'm worth something.
scenes.lastLine: I'll need Genie's help to make me a prince.

sentiment.quote: I can be someone Jasmine will notice.
You really gonna try to win the princess's heart?

scenes.name: Aladdin Becomes Prince Ali
scenes.summary: Genie transforms Aladdin into Prince Ali, enabling him to pursue Jasmine with the appearance of royalty.
scenes.firstLine: There's a lot we're gonna have to change.
scenes.lastLine: Prince Ali! Fabulous he! Ali Ababwa!

sentiment.quote: Let's make me a prince!
You're gonna be fabulous.

scenes.name: Prince Ali's Grand Entrance
scenes.summary: Aladdin, now Prince Ali, makes a grand entrance in Agrabah, impressing the townsfolk and seeking Jasmine's attention.
scenes.firstLine: Make way for Prince Ali!
scenes.lastLine: I hope Jasmine is watching.

sentiment.quote: This is it. Time to meet the princess.
Another suitor for the princess.

scenes.name: Jasmine Rejects Ali
scenes.summary: Princess Jasmine rejects Prince Ali, seeing through his fa√ßade and criticizing the pretenses of royal suitors.
scenes.firstLine: I am not a prize to be won!
scenes.lastLine: You're all the same, shallow and self-absorbed.

sentiment.quote: I am not a prize to be won!
Please, Princess, give me a chance.

scenes.name: Aladdin's Identity Crisis
scenes.summary: Aladdin struggles with his identity, fearing he cannot be himself and still win Jasmine's love.
scenes.firstLine: She'll never like me as I really am.
scenes.lastLine: I need to keep up the act if I'm going to impress her.

sentiment.quote: She'll never like me as I really am.
You just gotta be yourself.

scenes.name: Aladdin and Jasmine's Flight
scenes.summary: Aladdin, as Prince Ali, takes Jasmine on a magical carpet ride, revealing his true self through adventure.
scenes.firstLine: Do you trust me?
scenes.lastLine: It's a whole new world.

sentiment.quote: Do you trust me?
I've never seen anything like it!

scenes.name: Jafar's Discovery
scenes.summary: Jafar discovers Aladdin's identity and plots to steal the lamp to gain power.
scenes.firstLine: That street rat was actually a diamond in the rough.
scenes.lastLine: The lamp will be mine.

sentiment.quote: The lamp will be mine.
Let's snatch it and make you sultan.

scenes.name: Jafar Steals the Lamp
scenes.summary: Jafar successfully steals the magic lamp from Aladdin, using his new power to seize control of Agrabah.
scenes.firstLine: I'll take that, my boy.
scenes.lastLine: I am now the most powerful being on Earth.

sentiment.quote: I am now the most powerful being on Earth.
He's got the lamp.

scenes.name: Jafar's Reign
scenes.summary: Jafar uses his wishes to become sultan and the most powerful sorcerer, terrorizing Agrabah.
scenes.firstLine: I wish to be sultan of Agrabah!
scenes.lastLine: And now, to get rid of you.

sentiment.quote: And now, to get rid of you.
You're a monster, Jafar.
Jafar, what have you done?

scenes.name: Aladdin's Return
scenes.summary: Aladdin returns to Agrabah to stop Jafar and reveal his true nature to Jasmine, showing courage and integrity.
scenes.firstLine: I can't let Jafar destroy Agrabah.
scenes.lastLine: It's time to show Jafar who I really am.

sentiment.quote: It's time to show Jafar who I really am.
Aladdin, you've come back.

scenes.name: The Final Battle
scenes.summary: Aladdin confronts Jafar, outsmarting him by tricking Jafar into wishing himself into a genie, thus becoming trapped.
scenes.firstLine: You're not as powerful as you think, Jafar.
scenes.lastLine: Phenomenal cosmic powers... itty bitty living space.

sentiment.quote: The only way to have power is to be bound by the lamp.
I wish to be the most powerful genie!
Your wish is my command.

scenes.name: Aladdin's Last Wish
scenes.summary: Aladdin uses his final wish to free Genie, proving his selflessness and integrity.
scenes.firstLine: I wish for your freedom, Genie.
scenes.lastLine: You are free.

sentiment.quote: I wish for your freedom, Genie.
You really mean that, Al?

scenes.name: A New Beginning
scenes.summary: With Genie free and Jafar defeated, Aladdin and Jasmine can finally be together, leading to a happy resolution for all.
scenes.firstLine: So, what are you going to do next?
scenes.lastLine: A whole new world, with new horizons to pursue.

sentiment.quote: I want to be with you, Jasmine.
We'll be free to live our own lives.
I'm off to see the world!

locations.name: Agrabah
locations.quote: Welcome to Agrabah. City of mystery of enchantment and the finest merchandise this side of the river Jordan on sale today come on down!

locations.name: Cave of Wonders
locations.quote: At last after all my years of searching the cave of wonders!

locations.name: Sultan's Palace
locations.quote: Cut to int. of SULTAN's chamber. The door bursts open and PRINCE ACHMED storms in missing the rear end of his pants.

locations.name: Marketplace
locations.quote: Shopkeeper 1: Pretty lady buy a pot. No finer pot in brass or silver. Shopkeeper 2: Sugar dates sugar dates and figs! Sugar dates and pistachios!

characters.quote: I come from a land, from a faraway place where the caravan camels roam. It's barbaric, but hey--it's home.
Trust me my pungent friend. You'll get what's coming to you.
Oh, there's a big surprise! That's an incred--I think I'm gonna have a heart attack and die from not surprise!
All this for a loaf of bread?
Father, I hate being forced into this. If I do marry, I want it to be for love.
Ten-thousand years will give ya such a crick in the neck!
